titles.title: 9/11 Responder and Survivor Health Funding Correction Act of 2025
9/11 Responder and Survivor Health Funding Correction Act of 2025
A bill to amend title XXXIII of the Public Health Service Act with respect to flexibility and funding for the World Trade Center Health Program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
